description.narrative: table, .k-table{ border-collapse:collapse; width:100%; table-layout:fixed; margin-bottom: 15px;} .k-table, .k-table td, table, table td {outline: 0;border: 1px solid #000; } .k-table td, table td { padding: 5px; } The project consists of the construction, operation and maintenance of a 49.5 MW wind farm in Jordans Tafila Governorate (the "Project"). The Project will be an Independent Power Producer and will sell electricity to the National Electric Power Company (NEPCO) under a 20 year Power Purchase Agreement (PPA).

mailing-address.narrative: Abour Energy Company PSC Fereydoon Abtahi General Manager +962 06 582 8900 fabtahi@xenel.com P.O. Box 851875, Amman 11185, Jordan

table, .k-table{ border-collapse:collapse; width:100%; table-layout:fixed; margin-bottom: 15px;} .k-table, .k-table td, table, table td {outline: 0;border: 1px solid #000; } .k-table td, table td { padding: 5px; } Contact Person: Fereydoon Abtahi Company Name: Abour Energy Company Address: P.O. Box 851875, Amman 11185 Email: fabtahi@abourenergy.com Phone: 06 582 8900 Facsimile: 06 582 8911

name.narrative: table, .k-table{ border-collapse:collapse; width:100%; table-layout:fixed; margin-bottom: 15px;} .k-table, .k-table td, table, table td {outline: 0;border: 1px solid #000; } .k-table td, table td { padding: 5px; } The Project site is located in the Tafila region of Jordan and is primarily undeveloped and uncultivated. About 80% of the land is privately owned and land leasing arrangements are under process.
